com.adobe.pdfservices.operation

Interface Operation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombineFilesOperation, CompressPDFOperation, CreatePDFOperation, DeletePagesOperation, DocumentMergeOperation, ExportPDFOperation, ExportPDFToImagesOperation, ExtractPDFOperation, InsertPagesOperation, LinearizePDFOperation, OCROperation, PDFPropertiesOperation, ProtectPDFOperation, RemoveProtectionOperation, ReorderPagesOperation, ReplacePagesOperation, RotatePagesOperation, SplitPDFOperation

    public interface Operation
    This interface represents the basic contract for all the Operations. It imposes no restrictions or particular details on the operation execution process and leaves the specifics of setting up the operations to their individual implementations.

    A successfully executed Operation instance should not be reused.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object execute(ExecutionContext context)
      Executes this operation synchronously using the provided context instance.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Object execute(ExecutionContext context)
        throws ServiceApiException,
               IOException,
               ServiceUsageException
        Executes this operation synchronously using the provided context instance.
        Parameters:
        context - a ExecutionContext instance
        Returns:
        an Operation-specific result
        Throws:
        ServiceApiException - if an API call results in an error response
        IOException - if there is any I/O error
        ServiceUsageException - if service usage limits have been reached or credentials quota has been exhausted.
